title: WHY IS SHOP DISABLEEEEEED
body: I WAS JUST ABOUT TO BUY ELEMENTALIST LUX AND SOMEONE WAS GONNA GIFT ME STAR GUARDIAN WARD SKIN ;W; Y RITO Y{{champion:99}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Elementalist Lux was so popular that the sheer amount of purchase requests completely destroyed all of the store servers! *Just kidding!*

I'm actually not sure what specifically went wrong with the Store, but I know we [brought it down](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/) so we can investigate into some reported issues.

I can't provide an ETA on when it will be back, but please let me know if you have any questions.

oh targon quick question ;o do u have any information on why u guys decided to make it so u cant buy the Bundle of Master elemental lux for someone else? i wanted to try to get it for my friend but  if i want to do that now ima have to dump another 10$ into gifting her when i have 3700 Rp... currently opend a ticket to see if 800 can be transfered off of my account and onto hers but i  was just curio if u knew something for it.... tho i did get her the base skin atleast

I wish I knew the answer to that, but I don't. :(

I can let you know that we for sure cannot transfer RP between your and your friend's account, though. It seems the best option is the one you mentioned of gifting your friend the remaining RP they need to complete the bundle.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
but the thing is i cant even gift her the RP because i had already purchased it and i have no money left IRL
Just realized its disabled because of your comment ROFL
Same thing happened to me, not sure why it ain't working
